title: Japan Bankruptcies
description: Bankruptcies in Japan decreased to 596 Companies in October from 599 Companies in September of 2022. Bankruptcies in Japan averaged 894.16 Companies from 1952 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 1965 Companies in May of 1984 and a record low of 6 Companies in September of 1952. In Japan, bankruptcies account for insolvent corporations who cannot repay their debts to creditors and carry on with their business. This page provides - Japan Bankruptcies - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Tokyo Shoko Research
